price: Da Lũɗu, a lõkacin daya ce wa mutãnensa: "Shin, kunã jẽ wa alfãsha, bãbu kõwa da ya gabãce ku da ita daga halittu?"
arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنۡ أَحَدٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi atatūna al-fāḥishata mā sabaqakum bihā min aḥadin mina al-ʿālamīna
